remarks.para: May be inoperative provided any unserviceable unit(s) in excess of those required by FAR are removed from the compartment.

numlitem.para: For extended overwater flights at a horizontal distance of more than 50NM from the nearest shoreline, an approved life preserver or flotation means is required for each occupant.

placard.para: Placard near upper EICAS "LIFE PRESERVER INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
